attributes.action: take action to suspend the proposal to close many more post offices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The basis for formulating this petition 
is as follows...I have recently signed a petition asking for the decision to stop payment of pensions and allowances via the  Post Office Card Account, to be withdrawn....This will be a pointless exercise,if the proposal for a drastic  reduction the number of post offices goes ahead.....

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
